subject: Football
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The Patriots (9-0) are as pulverizing as Joe Frazier’s left hook; they flattened the Colts Sunday the way Frazier flattened Ali 36 years ago.
snippet: The Patriots (9-0) are as pulverizing as Joe Frazier’s left hook; they flattened the Colts Sunday the way Frazier flattened Ali 36 years ago.
